headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: Study Recommends Inmate Immunity Test
headline.main: APNewsBreak: Study Recommends Inmate Immunity Test

lead_paragraph: Federal experts are recommending that California test inmates for immunity to a sometimes fatal soil-borne fungus before incarcerating them at two Central Valley state prisons where the disease has killed nearly three dozen inmates, according to a report obtained Friday by The Associated Press.
